EmailTemplate.name: 202005_EMEAI_Defense_MSP_Gated-Content_Infographic.MSP Avionics for Helicopters
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading the Maintenance Service Plan infographic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for downloading the Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan infographic. To receive a copy of the infographic and a brochure, please click the links below.
Let’s Connect:
Sign up here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]> to stay in the loop with us, and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more. Download the Infographic <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/content/dam/aero/en-us/documents/learn/services/maintenance-and-service-plans/brochures/N40-2318-000-001_MSP_Avionics-br.pdf?download=true]]> Download the Brochure <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/content/dam/aero/en-us/documents/learn/services/maintenance-and-service-plans/brochures/N61-1643-000-001_MSP_Avionics_Heli-br.pdf?download=true]]> Please contact aero.marketing@honeywell.com <[[mailto:aero.marketing@honeywell.com]]> if you experience any issue downloading the assets.
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace
